The union: SEIU-UHW, launched a nationwide search for face masks and protective gear on March 21, 2020, due to the shortage caused by the COVID-19 pandemic.
On March 26: 2020, the union announced that it had found a supplier with 39 million masks.
Some partisan websites and memes suggest: s announcement and Attorney General William Barr's warning about pursuing cases against hoarders of essential medical supplies. However, there is no evidence of any link between the two.
The union never had possession of the ma: and the claim that they were "caught hiding" them is false. The masks were found through their efforts to locate suppliers.
